name: 恋鐘
trans: ──...It's so pretty~~!

name: 摩美々
text:
出たぁ
恋鐘の初見リアクションー
trans:
There it is. Kogane's acting like she's never seen
fireworks before.

name: 結華
text:
ほーんとに
こがたんは感動を逃さないねぇ
trans:
Hooonestly, Kogatan doesn't really miss a
beat with that.

name: 恋鐘
text: んふふ～
trans: Mfufu~

name: 恋鐘
text:
よかもんば見たら
すごか～って言うものばい！
trans:
When ya see somethin' real impressive,
ya gotta say it!

name: 恋鐘
text:
今日の花火は、
きれか～ですごか～！
trans:
And them fireworks today are lookin' mighty
impressive~!

name: 霧子
text:
ふふ……
うん……
trans:
Fufu...
Yes...

name: 霧子
text:
空も……
海も……
trans:
The sky...
And the sea...

name: 霧子
text:
花火で……
いっぱいだね……
trans:
Are filled with...
So many fireworks...!

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ……
待った甲斐がある、というものだ
trans:
Hehe...
You can say that it's worth the wait.

name: 咲耶
text:
今日の私たちの仕事に対する報酬──
と思ってしまうのは、傲慢だろうか？
trans:
You can also say that it's a splendid reward for
today's work── Or is that giving ourselves too
much credit?

name: 結華
text: いいんじゃなーい？
trans: It's fine, isn't it?

name: 結華
text:
アンティーカは今日のイベントでも、
お客さんたちをば～りばりに盛り上げてたでしょ！
trans:
L'Antica got the crowd totally fired up
at today's event, didn't we?

name: 摩美々
text: そうだったとしても……
trans: Even if it is...

name: 摩美々
text: 報酬が花火だけなのは勘弁ー
trans: ...I don't want our reward juuuust to be fireworks.

name: 咲耶
text: おや
trans: Oh?

name: 咲耶
text:
あの輝く大輪の花でも、
摩美々を満足させられないんだね
trans:
Even with a grand display of shining flowers in the
sky, Mamimi isn't satisfied at all.

name: 摩美々
text: 見てるだけだしねー
trans: That's because all I'm doing is just watching them.

name: 結華
text:
──じゃあさ
捕まえちゃえば加点できる？
trans:
Then perhaps...
We can score points if we try catching them?

name: 恋鐘
text:
ふぇ？
どがんことすると～？
trans:
Fue?
How can ya do somethin' like that~?

name: 結華
text: こがんことすると～！
trans: Allow me to demonstrate!

name: 結華
text: ──えいっ
trans: ──Ei!

name: 結華
text: ほらっ、こうすれば花火ゲット！　ってね
trans: See that? That's you can catch fireworks!

name: 霧子
trans:
Wow...!
Fufu...!

name: 霧子
text:
結華ちゃん……
花火……捕まえちゃった……
trans: Yuika-chan... caught a firework...!

name: 摩美々
text: えー？
trans: Ehhhh?

name: 摩美々
text:
霧子、判定甘くないー？
あれじゃすぐ逃げられるじゃんー
trans:
Kiriko, you're easily impressed.
You can't just give a pass with something like
thaaat...

name: 結華
text: そこは見逃してよー
trans: Aww, just cut me some slack!

name: 霧子
text: ふふ……
trans: Fufu...

name: 恋鐘
text:
そがんことやったらうちも捕まえる～！
待って～！
trans:
If that's how it's done, then I wanna try too~!
Just you wait~!

name: 咲耶
text:
みんなと……！
海……！
trans: I'm at the sea... with everyone!

name: 咲耶
text: ──その捕獲作戦、私にも噛ませてくれ！
trans:
──If that's the plan for today, then I'm coming right
in!

name: 結華
text:
おわぁっ！？
もー、さくやん！　勢い！
trans:
Whoa?!
Gosh Sakuyaaan! Easy there!

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ、フフ……！
すまない……！
trans:
Aaah, hehehe...!
Sorry about that!

name: 咲耶
text:
大好きな仲間と、大好きな海にいる──
そう思ったら、胸が高鳴ってしまって！
trans:
Just doing this with my dear friends and in the
sea── Thinking about it just filled me with
excitement!

name: 恋鐘
text:
よかよか！
せっかくやけん、い～っぱい楽しまんばね！
trans:
No need to be sorry!
We've come all this way, so let's have lotsa fun!

name: 恋鐘
text:
──あそこ！
新しかとのおるよ！
trans:
──Over there!
Imma grab a new one!

name: 霧子
text:
うん……
綺麗な……紫……
trans:
Yes...
It's a... beautiful purple...!

name: 咲耶
trans: ──Let's go...!

name: 摩美々
text: えー……
trans: Ehhh....

name: 摩美々
text:
…………
捕まえたいんなら、もっと静かにやったらぁ
trans:
If you're serious about wanting to catch them,
then you have to be more quiet.

name: 結華
text: そうしないと、すぐ逃げちゃうもんねぇ？
trans:
...Yeah! They'll run away if you're making a commotion,
right?

name: 摩美々
text: そーそー
trans: Exactly.

name: 摩美々
text:
落ち着いた方が、
三峰より上手く捕まえられると思うしー
trans:
Keep calm and chill, and you'll have an eaaasier
time catching them compared to Mitsumine.

name: 結華
text: ああっ、ひどい！
trans: Wow, how cruel!

name: 咲耶
text:
それもそうだね
私としたことが、失礼した
trans:
That's true.
Excuse me for my behavior earlier.

name: 咲耶
text: みんな、協力を頼めないかな
trans: Everyone, can I get some help?

name: 咲耶
text: とびきり大きい花火を、捕まえたいんだ
trans: I want to catch the biggest firework ever!
